items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: ZenCommand.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for quickly creating minimalist command panels. It provides a simple, customisable text input interface, ideal for modern, quiet web applications.

items.content_html: A simple CRM feature built with Django (backend) and React (frontend) as part of the Genie ERP challenge. It includes a form page for lead management and a Kanban view with drag-and-drop functionality, using WebSockets for real-time updates.
items.title: Ahmed-Azoz1/lightweight-crm-feature: A simple CRM feature built with Django (backend) and React (frontend) as part of the Genie ERP challenge. It includes a form page for lead management and a Kanban view with drag-and-drop functionality, using WebSockets for real-time updates.

items.content_html: An extremely lightweight HTTP request client for the command-line. Supports: http, https, proxy, redirects, cookies, content-encoding, multipart/form-data, multi-threading, recursive website crawling and mirroring.

items.content_html: QuarkDB is a lightweight, in-memory database built with TypeScript that provides Redis-compatible functionality with a modern developer experience. It implements efficient data structures and supports the RESP (Redis Serialization Protocol) for seamless communication.
items.title: dsoumitra693/quark-db: QuarkDB is a lightweight, in-memory database built with TypeScript that provides Redis-compatible functionality with a modern developer experience. It implements efficient data structures and supports the RESP (Redis Serialization Protocol) for seamless communication.
